paper_abstract: This paper surveys the present state of knowledge on propositional fuzzy logics extending SBL with an additional involutive negation. The involutive negation is added as a new propositional connective in order to improve the expressive power of the standard mathematical fuzzy logics based on continuous triangular norms. (C) 2009 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Fuzzy logics with an additional involutive negation
